agency_desc: A nonprofit organization that provides free air transportation for cancer patients, stem cell donors/recipients, and bone marrow donors/recipients, traveling to and from nationally recognized treatment centers, using the empty seats on corporate jets.
service_description: Coordinates free air transportation for cancer patients, stem cell donors/recipients, and bone marrow donors/recipients traveling to and from nationally recognized treatment centers, using the empty seats on corporate jets. Flights are not guaranteed.
site_details: Call for information. Contact may be made up to 3 weeks before appointment date.
site_eligibility: Must be ambulatory -- Must be free of life-support -- Must be going to a treatment center recognized by either the National Cancer Institute or the American College of Surgeons
